quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You are stronger than you think, and more capable than you ever imagined.
author: Unknown

quote: Every day is a second chance.
author: Unknown

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
author: Mariska Hargitay

quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
author: Mark Black

quote: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

quote: In the middle of a difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: No medicine cures what happiness cannot.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
author: Lalah Delia

quote: Mental health is not a destination, but a process. It's about how you drive, not where you're going.
author: Noam Shpancer

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I am in control of my thoughts and emotions
author: Unknown

quote: While your flame still flickers, it's not the end
author: Cedric Colin

quote: My brain has too many tabs open....
author: Juan-Taner Allerborn

quote: If thnik Bruno needs help. SOMEONE HELP HIM.
author: Juan-Taner Allerborn

quote: Life is like code - sometimes it needs refactoring.
author: Alicja Kowalska

quote: OH Fifty parte a casa!
author: Bruno Moura

quote: Is this code Neutro, ou picadinho Ö!
